title: Jinx is OP
body: Why has she been left in this state for so long {{champion:222}} ? It's just getting ridiculous. She's so noob friendly, get ad items and aoe damage in team fights. I've seen jinx's build horrifically and still get insanely fed. Nerf her rito

replies.body:
Do you know the secret to beating ADCs that work like Jinx? Go mid and stack a ton of AP.

Okay I'm joking, but if you think Jinx is powerful, prepare to be blown away by Vayne Jungle and Ezreal Runeglaive
Finally a thread I can agree with.

Ik she is op
She gave me my first Penta kill!
ily jinx <3
I just thought I was really good. Damn.

Ok lets say you're riot how do you nerf her? Her q got nerfed so her early game isnt as strong she has no get a-ways besides a passive that you need to get a kill with or an assist. her zap is a skill shot that in lane is easy to dodge as long as you don't put yourself in a place to get fucked, her q during lane phase costs a hell tone of mana.

i believe she is balanced right now especially after the Q attack speed nerf. Other than that Jinx have like the worst Attack speed growth in the game. her attack speed gain at lvl18 is 17% meaning he gains 1% AS per lvl which is extremely low.
She had the highest winrate of any champion and was the most picked ADC like 2 months ago. Which is why she DID get nerfed, TWICE. Her Ult lost damage and her Q range was nerfed quite substantially.
52 percent win rate over 30% pick rate, balanced. Kappa
